channel.title: Getting Started on Amazon EKS Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Amazon EKS Workshop

item.title: Using Cloud 9
item.description: Visit Cloud9 console and click Shared with you menu option: Then click the Open IDE button the troubleshoot-workshop environment. Configure AWS CLI with the current AWS Region as default: Execute the following commands in the terminal: This script configures the AWS CLI to use the current region as the default. export ACCOUNT_ID=$(aws sts get-caller-identity --output text --query Account) export AWS_REGION=$(curl -s 169.254.169.254/latest/dynamic/instance-identity/document | jq -r '.region') echo "export ACCOUNT_ID=${ACCOUNT_ID}" | tee -a ~/.
